3276CF1D8A8D5E1D5B95E7FFA6541F79: 'Sploding scoff-laws. Watch for their airborne attacks!
98237893CB2D18C45B95E7FFA6541F79: A close-range skelly-wag warrior from sixty fathoms deep.

405F9B8D61D1CD375B95E7FFA6541F79: A deadeye archer, if they only had eyes

5FD01B9ABF85ABA55B95E7FFA6541F79: Arctic arachnids who love to hide in snowdrifts before they attack. This pest drops items that would be useful to put in the <EmphA>Loom</>.

17740D6747DB6A3F5B95E7FFA6541F79: Avast, ye! There be arrows incoming from long-range!

8DA0AB1527BFBC4D5B95E7FFA6541F79: It's no accident they're so good at fighting. Be cautious of their close-ranged attacks.
